title: ER KANG Smith Machine, 2000lbs Strength Training Cage with Cable Crossover System, Multi-Function with Olympic Weights, Linear Bearing Workout Machine for Home Gym
features: 【Linear-Bearing Smith Machine】Experience the sensation of free weights with the H10 Olympic bar, which glides on two precision linear roller bearings. Providing a smooth and long-lasting lifting experience. It's important to note that linear bearings be ten times smoother and more durable, ensuring that you can enjoy a high-quality lifting experience for years to come.

【Latest Upgrade】This time we upgraded the Smith in all: The top band peg design to increase training difficulty and stability, improve muscle motion, and has a wide use; the zigzag design not only protects the rod, but also makes it easy to hang the smith bar while you exercise. The biggest surprise is leg hold on attachment, this leg hold down attachment allows you to pull down more comfortably.

【Commercial Quality】Constructed from 2" x 2.9", 14-gauge steel for stability throughout the frame during high-intensity training (loading to 2000lbs). Smith cage assembled size: 63.2’’(L) x 70.9’’(W) x 86.6’’(H). Gross Weight: 338LBS. The workout bench makes of 14 gauge tube, weight capacity up to 800 lbs. Gross Weight of the bench is 45lb.

【All-in-One Gym】ER KANG smith machine can truly fulfill all the needs of a home gym. The Cable crossover system has 16 adjustable heights, whether you want to use it for cable crossover fly, bicep curl, triceps pull down, lat pull down, you will find the right height. Additionally, you can perform wide and narrow pull-ups, shoulder press, cable chest fly, seated rows, bench presses, squats, deadlifts, dips, and more.

【Fully Equipped】Equipped with multiple accessories, such as a weight storage rack, footboard, 4 storage hooks, it also includes battle rope anchor, pull up bar, T bar, lat pull down bar, cable bar, and a pair of dip bars, j hooks,and cablehandles, etc.(Dumbbells not include)

【Safety】Smith bar catch and smith bar safety catch provide double protection for your movement. Both catches have 14 levels of height adjustment, to meet your different height needs. Max capacity: smith bar catch - 450 lbs | smith bar safety catch - 450 lbs | J hook - 300 lbs | cable system - 450 lbs.

【BRAND SUPPORT】ER KANG is a professional fitness brand committed to designing and manufacturing the best home gym equipment. If there is any question about this smith machine, please feel free to contact us, we are always here for you. Warranty: LIFETIME. NOTE: The smith machine will be shipped in four packages (which may be not arrived at the same time)
